name: Screensaver
description:
Remember the good old screensaver with the square bouncing around? Exactly, the one where it seems to be the most satisfying feeling in the world when it hits a corner! Well, you're in charge in this game! Play without pressure, only to your enjoyment and make the square hit the corner :)

WASD to move the bounding box.

!Onehourgamejam entry!
